svg.title: Players want to define their own virtual worlds, but they can't because making their own virtual worlds is hard.
svg.desc:
#title: Players want to define their own virtual worlds, but they can't because making their own virtual worlds is hard. #fontSize: 8 #spacing: 12 #padding: 3 #direction: right
[V-Sekai| Players want to define the virtual worlds. | V-Sekai https://v-sekai.org/ | Players can't make their own virtual worlds because it is hard.] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Godot world live creation] [Godot world live creation] -> [Imported physics] [Godot world live creation] -> [Place prexisting blocks with blockmeshing ] [Godot world live creation]-> [<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] [Godot world live creation]-> [Place scenes ] [Godot world live creation]-> [Construct layers collaboratively ] [Godot world live creation]-> [Painting ] [Godot world live creation]-> [<table> Create Godot world creation tools] [<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] -> [3D models with CASSIE ] [3D models with CASSIE ]-> [make cassie commercial remixable] [<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] -> [Painting with MaterialX ] [Godot world live creation] -> [ Jeana usability] [Godot world live creation] -> [VFX (Particles, shaders, Sky)] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Advanced avatar (shader, IK, animations)] [V-Sekai]-> [Skeleton modifications ] [Skeleton modifications ] -> [<table> Become avatars] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Vocal communicate] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Motion communicate] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Dance]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [Godot speech comms system] [<table> Become avatars] -> [Virtual reality 6 degree of freedom tracking ]
[<table> Become avatars]->[<table> Following ] [<table> Following] -> [Double-sided friending. ] [<table> Following] -> [Discover new friends. ]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [Locomotion (flat)] [<tsable> Become avatars] -> [Virtual reality motion movement]
[Virtual reality motion movement] -> [Pickups] [Pickups]-> [Wasgo Scripting ] [Pickups]-> [In-game menus ] [Pickups]-> [Video player ]
[Pickups]->[Vehicles ] [Pickups]->[Buttons]
[Pickups]->[<table> Avatar switch ] [Pickups]->[World portals ] [Pickups]->[Server switch ]
[Pickups]->[<table> Player interactions ] [<table> Player interactions] -> [Camera ] [<table> Player interactions] -> [Bow and arrow ] [<table> Player interactions] -> [Mirror ]
[V-Sekai]->[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] [<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] -> [ Federation list ] [<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] -> [ Delegated Identity ]
[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure ]->[<table> Content] [<table> Content ]-> [Refuse to attest content because scripting is untrusted ]
[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure]->[<table> Deployment kit ]
[<table> Create Godot world creation tools ] -> [<table> Upgrade PLY to Godot Engine]
[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] -> [<table> Launch uro using Elixir Desktop]
[<table> platform host Uro Infrastructure] -> [<table> Make TrueNas Scale run V-Sekai mirror]
[<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we animate the character? VRM1 rig] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we retarget to the VRM1 rig?] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we mocapture the face rig? Support mapping every single possible standard rig?] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we make the face rig fast? Blend shape baking to skeletals] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we create the standard animation set? Want to be better than the status quo of mixamo animation sets] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we interact with objects? Pickup animation is stored on prop] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How do we have more diverse characters? Marketplace? Proceduralism? Character generators?] [<table> Become avatars] -> [How we turn our voice to facial rig keyframes?]
[V-Sekai] - [Last changed datetime|2022-02-09T19:47+00:00]
svg.text: Players want to define the virtual worlds.
Players can't make their own virtual worlds because it is hard.
